comments:
3.3M1

Steps to reproduce:

- start from the following CU:

import java.util.Collection;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.List;

class Foo {
	void bar() {
		List list= null;
		for (Iterator iter= list.iterator(); iter.hasNext();) {
			Collection object= (Collection) iter.next();
			
		}
	}
}

- local rename first "Collection" in for loop to "Object"
- organize imports while still in linked mode
